name: Look Out! (The Vengabus is Coming)
description:
"The explosion of rainbow sparkles, accompanied by the sound of bubble wrap as the partybus runs over another hoard of people, is disgustingly satisfying." -- a player

A very silly entry in PIGSquad's 2020 Summer Slow Jam - "Music-First/Ghost Notes Jam."

Music by pico-8 music wizard Gruber.

Look out! The Vengabus is coming. Don't get hit! (Do get hit, actually.)
